name: The Adventures of Squeak
description: A classic style RPG Game. You start off as a rat in a large forest with your family asking you to participate in some simple favors for them. You find yourself up against an evil greedy monster that forces you down a small hole into levels of a sort of labyrinth. This evil controlling monster wishes you bring him everything you find in your travels back to him. Can you escape the evil and collect all items you need, to be strong enough to defeat him in the end? Game consists of 25+ levels of fun, adventure and puzzle solving objects with up to 3 player party members to help you as levels progress!
